text: The Stone Boy is a 1984 American drama movie directed by Christopher Cain and is based on the 1957 short story of the same name by Gina Berriault. It stars Robert Duvall, Jason Presson, Glenn Close, Dean Cain, Frederic Forest, Cindy Fisher, Linda Hamilton, Tom Waits and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1984 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on short stories
